name: bcompiler_read
purpose: Reads and creates classes from a filehandle

return.description: Returns TRUE on success or FALSE on failure.

notes.description:
This function is
EXPERIMENTAL. The behaviour of this function, its name, and
surrounding documentation may change without notice in a future release of PHP.
This function should be used at your own risk.

Please use include or require statements to parse bytecodes, it's more
    portable and convenient way than using this function.Please note that this function won't execute script body code contained
    in the bytecode file.
